transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: ji good morning.
Executive: Haan ji good morning. Good morning sir good morning.
Customer: aapne mail kiya tha mujhe sir.
Executive: Haan wo usi ke liye hai yaar mera har kisi ka to jitne bhi OTP aa rahe hain har kisi se aa rahe hain aisa Jio mein to koi aisa issue aa nahi raha hai sirf India Mart ki taraf se hi ek OTP nahi aa raha hai jo mera team member hai staff hai jo.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Haan to matlab kuch na kuch to issue India Mart ke OTP mein hi hai.
Executive: India Mart OTP pe sir issue nahi hai actually aap ek kam kariye uska maine already pucha hua tha aapne keh raha tha theek ho gaya to maine chod diya lekin agar aapko ye regularly issue face ho raha hai to aap ek kam kariye aap ek bar Google messages open kariye.
Customer: Google mein kya karu?
Executive: Google messages aapka phone android hai na jisme issue ho raha hai ye right.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan aap ek bar Google messages open kariye and ha Google messages open kariye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Three nahi three dot menu ka option hai isme three dot menu ka.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute.
Customer: Three dot menu to kya hai meri yaha pe photo aa rahi hai usi mein hi dikh sakta hai chaliye bolo isme aage.
Executive: Shayad ha okay isme dekhiye option hoga spam and blocked ka okay spam and blocked ka koi option hai shayad hai na.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aisa hai koi right India Mart employee never ask for OTP ye block ho rakha hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: To us pe India Mart pe and tap us pe kariye or not spam mark kar dijiye theek hai.
Customer: Ye kaise ho gaya yaar.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: [inaudible] taraf se nahi tha aapki taraf se hi tha aap please usko koi issue nahi hai ho jata hai aap ye kar dijiye ab aapko shayad most probably aapko OTP aane lagenge isme aap check kar liya kariye ga theek hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha theek hai.
Executive: Okay. Theek hai to aapka email matlab spam me hue the aise kaise ho gaye main dalta to hu spam mein lekin ye galti se.
Executive: Nahi wo Google ki taraf se aapki taraf se bhi issue nahi hai aisa nahi ki aapki taraf se hua Google kabhi kabhi automatic AI ka zamana hai sir kya AI karte aap aapke jane bagair aap bhi hairan ho jayenge hai na.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: To wahi hua hai usi ki vajah se na India Mart ki taraf se na aapki taraf se no tension to abhi aapko spam mein nahi hai to matlab aapko OTP aayega theek hai so aapka ye concern aur koi issue tha?
Customer: Nahi nahi bas yahi issue tha abhi to filhal aage aayenge to aur batayenge.
Executive: Bilkul mujhe batayega aapko aise mail wagera karne ki zarurat nahi hai aap mere ko phone kar tab bhi ho jayega aisa koi wo nahi hai ki officially aap karenge tabhi matlab jo hai mujhe bhi fir aapko apne uske toll free number se call karna pad jata hai ki sab cheez record hui hai India Mart pe khair koi dikkat nahi hai theek hai main aapka ye concern close kar raha hu mera aapko feedback jayega to please aap mera feedback share kar dijiyega theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai okay.
Executive: Theek hai ji thank you sir thank you.
Customer: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving OTPs from IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Asked to unblock IndiaMART from spam list.

- Explained the issue was from Google's end.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to check if OTPs are received.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- otp, spam, google messages, ai
